HelpText.zhCN: ${Key}开关此窗口，游戏启动后输入存储箱ID或物流站ID后按回车开启存储箱 物流站ID中`S`大小写不敏感 收藏中点击直接打开对应存储箱或物流站 鼠标拖动移动窗口
HelpText.enUS: ${Key} to open this window. Enter storage ID or station ID and hit Enter to open it after game loaded. Letter `S` in Station ID is case-insensitive Click item in favorites to open corresponding storage box or station. Drag to move the window.

存储箱ID格式错误, 应为小数(工厂索引.存储箱ID).enUS: StorageID format error, should be decimal (FactoryIndex.StorageID)
